RPGXplorerObject.Name: Acid Resistance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 10 resistance to Acid.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Acid Resistance, Improved
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 20 resistance to Acid.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Acid Resistance, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 30 resistance to Acid.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Animated
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Upon command, an animated shield floats within 2 feet of the wielder.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Arrow Catching
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shield with this ability attracts ranged weapons to it.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bashing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A bashing shield deals damage as if it were a weapon of two size categories larger.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Arrow Deflection
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Protects the wearer as if he had Deflect Arrows feat.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Blinding
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can flash with a brilliant blinding light up to twice per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cold Resistance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 10 resistance to Cold.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cold Resistance, Improved
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 20 resistance to Cold.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cold Resistance, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 30 resistance to Cold.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Electricity Resistance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 10 resistance to Electricity.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Electricity Resistance, Improved
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 20 resistance to Electricity.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Electricity Resistance, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 30 resistance to Electricity.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Etherealness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wearer can become etheral once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Fire Resistance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 10 resistance to Fire.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Fire Resistance, Improved
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 20 resistance to Fire.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Fire Resistance, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 30 resistance to Fire.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Fortification, Light
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 25% chance that critical or sneak attack hit only does normal damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Fortification, Moderate
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 75% chance that critical or sneak attack hit only does normal damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Fortification, Heavy
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Critical or sneak attack hits only do normal damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ghost Touch
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Armor and enhancment bonus apply to attacks from incorporeal creatures.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Glamered
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Upon command, armor can change shape to appear as normal clothing retaining AC.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Invulnerability
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer damage reduction of 5/Magic.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Reflecting
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day can reflect a spell as per Spell Turning.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shadow
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 competence bonus on Hide checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shadow, Improved
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +10 competence bonus on Hide checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shadow, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +15 competence bonus on Hide checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Silent Moves
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 competence bonus on Move Silently checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Silent Moves, Improved
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +10 competence bonus on Move Silently checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Silent Moves, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +15 competence bonus on Move Silently checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Slick
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Slick, Improved
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +10 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Slick, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +15 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sonic Resistance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 10 resistance to Sonic.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sonic Resistance, Improved
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 20 resistance to Sonic.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sonic Resistance, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 30 resistance to Sonic.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Spell Resistance 13
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Spell resistance of 13.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Spell Resistance 15
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Spell resistance of 15.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Spell Resistance 19
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Spell resistance of 19.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Spell Resistance 17
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Spell resistance of 17.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Undead Controlling
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wearer may control up to 26HD of undead as per Control Undead spell until dawn.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Wild
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Armor bonus inc. enhancement retained while in Wild Shape.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Aporter
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Transports the wearer and her equipment to any spot within 800ft.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Averter
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Inflict aversion on target that prevents them approaching within 30ft.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ectoplasmic
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Converts itself and wearer into an ectoplasmic form for upto 5 minutes once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Floating
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Armor is psionically buoyant in water or a similar liquid.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gleaming
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Armor gleams and flashes granting the wearer concealment.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Heartening
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer up to 5 temporary hit points per day on command.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Landing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Ignore any damage dealt by the first 60ft of any fall.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Linked
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Allows wearer to form telepathic bond with other wearers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Manifester
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Generates 3 power points per day for the wearer.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mindarmor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer +3 insight bonus on will saving throws vs. mind-affecting/compulsion powers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: +3 Will Saving Throw [Insight] [vs. mind-affecting and/or compulsion powers]
Phasing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wearer can move through wooder, plaster or stone walls up to 60ft per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Power Resistance 13
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer power resistance 13.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Power Resistance 15
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer power resistance 15.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Power Resistance 17
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer power resistance 17.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Power Resistance 19
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer power resistance 19.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Quickness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Increases the wearer's speed by 5ft.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Radiant (Acid)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants acid resistance 10. Radiates light per point absorbed.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Radiant (Cold)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants cold resistance 10. Radiates light per point absorbed.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Radiant (Electricity)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants electricity resistance 10. Radiates light per point absorbed.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Radiant (Fire)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants fire resistance 10. Radiates light per point absorbed.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Radiant (Sonic)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants sonic resistance 10. Radiates light per point absorbed.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ranged
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Shield can be thrown as a ranged weapon that returns to the wielder.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Seeing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants a wider than normal field of vision.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Time Buttress
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wearer can use Timeless Body once per day as per power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Vanishing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Renders wearer and equipment invisible as per Cloud Mind power (2/day).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Wall
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can drop shield and command Wall of Ectoplasm as per power (1/day).
